name: Punch/Foot/Gun
description:
How about a gun that throws out melee attacks!

W and D - to move
Space - to jump
Left Click - for punch
Right Click - for Foot
1 - will reset the level

m - for fullscreen

use punch and foot to destroy the enemy

use the truck and box for safety

there are 3 levels, and the last level repeats, the goal is to go right.

TIP: to get far on the third level, you will need a good combination of foot and punch.

This is my submission for Ludum Dare 32

Enjoy!
